title: Meredith and Derek's Secret Relationship and the Arrival of Addison
description: Meredith Grey and Derek Shepherd's clandestine romance is tested by workplace secrecy, Meredith's personal burdens, and Derek's unresolved past. The arc intensifies as their relationship is exposed by the sudden arrival of Derek's wife, Addison, setting the stage for emotional and professional upheaval.
main_characters: Meredith Grey; Derek Shepherd; Addison Shepherd
single_episode_progression_string: This episode climaxes the secrecy of Meredith and Derek's relationship with Addison's dramatic entrance, forcing their romance into the open and introducing new complications for both their personal and professional lives.
consolidation_notes: No merging required; this arc is distinct in its focus on Meredith and Derek's romantic trajectory and the impact of Addison's arrival.

title: Cristina Yang's Secret Pregnancy and Emotional Isolation
description: Cristina Yang grapples with an unplanned pregnancy, choosing secrecy and self-reliance over vulnerability. Her struggle to conceal her condition from Preston Burke and her peers highlights her difficulty with emotional openness and foreshadows future conflict and growth.
single_episode_progression_string: Cristina continues to hide her pregnancy and plans for an abortion, deepening her emotional isolation and setting up tension with Burke as she avoids disclosure.
consolidation_notes: No merging required; this arc is specific to Cristina's internal struggle and relationship with Burke.

title: George O'Malley's Sexual Naivety and Social Awakening
description: George O'Malley confronts the realities of adult relationships, sexual health, and peer perception after contracting syphilis. The arc follows his embarrassment, the strain on his relationship with Olivia, and the shifting dynamics among the interns as George is forced toward greater self-awareness.

title: The Interns' Ethical Boundaries and Rule-Breaking Ambition
description: The surgical interns repeatedly test ethical and procedural boundaries in their pursuit of medical knowledge and validation. This arc explores their willingness to bend or break rules, the risks they take for patient care or personal ambition, and the consequences for their careers and mentor relationships.
main_characters: Cristina Yang; Izzie Stevens; Meredith Grey; Miranda Bailey
